queries.sheet: SELECT '${reportTitle}' as ReportTitle, '${DATE.UTC:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' as UTC_DateTime, '${DATE.UTC:YYYY-MM-DD}' as UTC_Date, '${DATE.UTC:HH:mm:ss}' as UTC_TimeOnly, '${DATE.UTC:YYYYMMDD}' as UTC_CompactDate, '${DATE.UTC:YYYY/MM/DD HH:mm}' as UTC_SlashFormat

SELECT '${DATE.KST:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}' as KST_DateTime, '${DATE.KST:YYYY-MM-DD}' as KST_Date, '${DATE.KST:HH:mm:ss}' as KST_Time, '${DATE.KST:YYYY년 MM월 DD일}' as KoreanStyleDate, '${DATE.KST:YYYY년 MM월 DD일 HH시 mm분}' as KoreanStyleDateTime

SELECT '${DATE.UTC:YYYYMMDD}' as DateCompact, '${DATE.UTC:YYYYMMDD_HHmmss}' as DateTimeForFile, '${DATE.UTC:YYYY-MM-DD}' as DateWithDash, '${DATE.UTC:YYYYMMDD_HHmm}' as ShortDateTime, 'Report_${DATE.UTC:YYYYMMDD}_${department}.xlsx' as ExampleFilename

SELECT '${department}' as Department, 'Report Date: ${DATE.KST:YYYY년 MM월 DD일}' as ReportDate, 'Created: ${DATE.KST:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm}' as CreatedTime, 'Backup_${DATE.UTC:YYYYMMDD}.sql' as BackupFilename, 'WHERE created_date >= ''${DATE.UTC:YYYY-MM-DD}''' as QueryExample

SELECT '${DATE.UTC:YYYY-MM-DD}' as UTC_DateWithDash, '${DATE.UTC:YYYY/MM/DD}' as UTC_DateWithSlash, '${DATE.UTC:YYYY.MM.DD}' as UTC_DateWithDot, '${DATE.UTC:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS}' as UTC_HighPrecisionTime, '${DATE.KST:YY/MM/DD HH:mm}' as KST_ShortFormat, '${DATE.UTC:YYYY-MM}' as UTC_YearMonthOnly, '${DATE.UTC:MM/DD HH:mm}' as UTC_MonthDayTime
